property.name: text
property.value:
This model demonstrates the use of the discrete event (DE) domain and hierarchical finite state machines (FSMs) to model the alternating bit protocol (ABP). ABP is a simple mechanism for achieving reliable, ordered delivery of messages over channels with unreliable delivery and variable delay.
This demo shows that: * Hierarchical FSMs can efficiently capture complex sequential control behavior. * Embedding FSMs within other models of computation is a clean and flexible way to model the concurrent execution of FSMs.

property.name: text
property.value: Timer to wait before doing a retransmission.

property.name: text
property.value: If initial connection fails, display a message. This happens rarely.

property.name: text
property.value:
Simple channel model.
Lose packets with the specified lossProbability and delay them a uniform random delay between minimumDelay and maximumDelay.

entity.name: Bernoulli
entity.doc: Create a sequence of bernoulli random variables

property.name: text
property.value: Initialize the connection by sending a message with value -1 repeatedly until an acknowlegement is received. This implementation will try five times using an external timer to determine the time between tries.

property.name: text
property.value: Variable used to limit the number of retries. This will count down each time we send an initialize message out.

property.name: annotation
property.value: // If timer expires, resend initliazation message.

property.name: text
property.value: In each state, resend message until a matching acknowlegement is received. Then switch to the other state and wait for a new message to send.

property.name: annotation
property.value: // New message to send has arrived.

property.name: annotation
property.value: // New message to send has arrived.

property.name: text
property.value: After a random delay, generate the next integer in a counting sequence.

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value

entity.name: ColtExponential
entity.doc: Create a sequence of Exponential random variables

entity.name: StringConst
entity.doc: Create a constant sequence with a string value.
